name: Zombie Seige
description:
Hey guys,

Just a little top-down shooter I've been working on for the last couple of months. It's technically my "first" complete game. The goal here was just to finish something, so a lot of things ended up getting cut and in the end I thought I'd cap things off here and move on to the next project.

Certainly learned a lot through this process and look forward to bringing out something much better in future.

Cheers!
